original_text: Then the men set out from there, and they looked down toward Sodom. And Abraham went with them to set them on their way.
korean_text: 그 사람들이 거기서 일어나서 소돔으로 향하고 아브라함은 그들을 전송하러 함께 나가니라

sentences.original_text: Then the men set out from there
and they looked down toward Sodom
to set them on their way
